name: Escape The Casino (GMTK Jam 2022)
description:
Controls are: Left/Right arrows to move, X to jump, Z to shoot

Every time you kill an enemy, a dice is rolled. If you get a high value, you get a positive effect, if you get a low value, you get a negative effect:

  1. Health set to 1 heart
  2. Health loses 1 heart
  3. Movement speed is halved for a few seconds
  4. Jump boost for a few seconds
  5. Speed boost for a few seconds
  6. Health refilled, and a shield given

Sorry about the lack of polish. This was my first time participating in such a short Game Jam, and I started very late in the Jam so probably only spent ~10 hours in total on this, and because of this was unable to make the majority of things i wanted in the game.
